page.title: 05FASHION IN 1985 IN G'M
page.content: We 11 year old girls wear lipstick in pastel shades.On our eyes we wear black mascara.This is a pot of liquid with a special brush.We mostly wear blue or black eye-liner.On our cheeks we wear a pastel coloured blusher. The clothes we wear in winter are big woolly jumpers,baggy jeans and short socks or tights.We usually wear grey jeans but there are black and blue as well.Jumpers are usually in bright colours and some are bat-winged.This means that the sleeves get larger as they get near your waist. In the summer we wear big, short-sleeved tee-shirts,baggy shorts and short socks.Pastel colours are the most popular this summer. Short hair-cuts are in fashion,with the hair just above the shoulder and the fringe spikey.
